Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Dallas”
Reviews.Author: WernerAlbl
Reviews.Content: We spent a weekend with friends in Dallas. The hotel has a frindly and very helpful staff. The rooms are awesome and very clean. Although not in the very best area of Dallas it was quit and without any problem to reach e.g. AA Center in 10 and downtown Dallas in 15 min by car. Great breakfast. A good experience all around for a very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service”
Reviews.Author: Johns T
Reviews.Content: Thank you for providing a wonderful stay. Specifically I enjoy the quality of staff you have working. Location is a bit to be desired.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: 766traveler
Reviews.Content: Everyone was helpful and friendly. Allowed an early check-in. Breakfast was nice, selection varied each day. Pool and hot-tub and exercise room were well maintained. A pleasant experience all around. The neighborhood isn't great-you would not want to walk around outside after dark, but the shuttle to nearby places was nice and it is easy to get around if you have a car.

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel, crap location”
Reviews.Author: Spagetti61
Reviews.Content: Could not believe the location, a reasonable distance from downtown and airport and right next to the Men's Club in red light district. All the taxi drivers new the location by this reference marker. Having said that it was very clean, well appointed and good value. Breakfast is typically low-cost US Style- reasonable range of self help cooked food and continental ingredients, but with styrofoam plates, plastic KFS and cups. Staff were pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Cozy and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Renato_Fusaro
Reviews.Content: We've been in Dallas for a Medical Meeting, and the Hotel was way more cozy than we expected. Front desker named Steve offered help almost every time he saw us. The complimentary breakfast was very good yet simple, the gym and pool as well. Good location near the Dallas 12 loop and all major expways. Great Deal for sure.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT NIGHT!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Amber V
Reviews.Content: Great night stay! We checked in around 9:30, Steve was very friendly at the front desk! He had tips and tricks for future reservations. The room was clean and modern, the bed was SOO COMFY! The pool was open late, Steve offered us towels and mopped the hallway from all wet tracks! The breakfast was great! Everything was clean, staff was friendly, the area was not bad!! STAY HERE!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: jason D
Reviews.Content: A Great Hotel. Sonita and the rest of the management were awesome! I was with a group that had a bunch of special request, and they deliver on even one. Rooms were large, comfortable, and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Best Affordable Hotel in Texas”
Reviews.Author: Michael S
Reviews.Content: The Baymont has an average price with an above average quality. I was here on a work-related visit and was shocked at what a friendly experience I had. I met both the owners and they made me feel like I was being welcomed into their home instead of an inn. I would definitely say that they are both more part of the hospitality business than they are in the hotel business. I promise you that after your visit, you will wish you were friends with the staff in your personal life. I was also very at ease in the clean hotel room and this is coming from a germaphobe. The breakfast was delicious and you should check out the great indoor pool as well. Very warm, upbeat feel to the overall experience and I can't wait to come back!

Reviews.Title: “Great, welcoming staff!”
Reviews.Author: Brad R
Reviews.Content: I stay 5-6 days a week in hotels. My wife and I checked in with Steve at the front counter. We visited as we checked in, told him thank you and went to eat dinner. Later that evening as we entered the lobby, Steve spoke to us by name. Never before in 9 years of being on the road have I ever experienced a hotel clerk remembering my name! Thank you Steve for making my day! Most definitely plan to stay again!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place if you're just passing through”
Reviews.Author: Jill B
Reviews.Content: It was clean and comfortable. I did notice that the lotion bottle that was in the bathroom had been used by the previous visitors and not replaced with a good one. The breakfats was okay. The eggs had an artificial taste to them.

Reviews.Title: “January Market Stay”
Reviews.Author: Chris B
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been recently renovated and looked great. They did a really nice job making it feel fresh but also very warm and inviting. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. But what really made this hotel a stand-out were the owners who were very hands-on and went that extra mile to make sure our stay was the best. Fresh baked cookies, chair massages and a great breakfast were just a few of their special touches. I will definitely be booking my week long stay for the next market with them!

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: This1ClassyChick
Reviews.Content: My family and I are traveling from el paso and needed a place to stay for the night. Called several places and either didn't accept pets or had a big non refundable pet depost, so this place accepted pets for 10 bucks! What sold me was the rate with amentites that include buffet breakfast, inside pool and close to the freeway! By the way, my son and I has the pool all to ourselves!! Loved it, would absolutely stay again! Beds are very comfy! Great experience!

Reviews.Title: “Stayed for a convenient return to NYC”
Reviews.Author: SueSyo
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a convenient return to NYC via Southwest (Dallas Love to Houston Hobby - $60) then JetBlue (Houston Hobby to JFK - $!00) (vs. $350+ for any other airline). The location was fine for the airport. The hotel appears to have been nicely renovated recently, and the staff was very friendly. The free included breakfast was very nice, and there was a warm atmosphere in the common areas. The location was fine for the purpose and the reasonable cost. Although it was not very close to a downtown restaurant type area, you could fine OK restaurants and easily drive to anywhere. Some other reviews have said you might stay as inexpensively at other more central locations but I did not find that to be the case ($100 here, and very comfortable and friendly) vs. minimum of $200 anywhere else, and that was in the very slow January time frame. So I found this to be very comfortable and a very good value. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “TREATED LIKE A QUEEN from sl”
Reviews.Author: lulu250
Reviews.Content: iF YOU DON'T STAY HERE YOU HAVE MISSED IT! The owners as well as any staff member are so friendly and helpful. Stay here one time and they will always remember you., The entire hotel is spotless and almost sparkles. You can tell they are so proud of their hotel and treat it as their home. The beds are so awesome and are perfect after along stay at Market. The location is ideal to some of the best dining in Dallas also. Sunita went the extra "mile" and invited the massage school to send interns for free 15 minute massages to relax those tired and aching shoulders. This stay was over the top!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Patticoke
Reviews.Content: I made the reservation on the road heading to Dallas. I talked to "Steve" who was super nice and I made the reservation. I was very pleased when we arrived. The room was very spacious and clean. I needed a room that allowed smoking. That is becoming harder and harder to find. You couldn't even tell someone had even smoked in there. I use to stay at Hiltons, Hyatt's, etc. I've stayed at really nice hotels. This ranked high on my list because it was clean and because you couldn't top the friendliness. That matters to me the most. I would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone desiring a clean room with probably the friendliest people in Texas.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Accommodations and Service”
Reviews.Author: CarlSNewBraunfels
Reviews.Content: Stayed over New Year's Eve. Hotel was very clean. Carpets cleaner than most hotels I've stay in lately. Service was excellent. Only problem was a malfunctioning elevator, which I'm sure has been fixed.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a great price”
Reviews.Author: ugadawg720
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for four nights and could not have been more pleased. The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean, the bed was great and the breakfast was fantastic. This hotel can not be beat for the value and service they offer. The location is also convenient to many restaurants and shopping centers. We will definitely be staying at this hotel again on our next visit to Dallas.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for a good stay”
Reviews.Author: CenTxVanDriver
Reviews.Content: From a stay Feb 2/3, 2011 This Baymont was a good value for a clean, quiet place to stay. The room, lobby, and grounds all were spotless. Though this hotel is in midtown Dallas and close to highways and an airport, we heard very little noise, either from outside the hotel or from other guests. If you happen to like a firm bed, this Baymont is your place. Wireless internet worked very well. Breakfast offered a good variety and was fresh and plentiful. Every one of the staffers seemed to enjoy their work. They were pleasant to deal with and always had a smile. Nellie the housekeeper was a delightful person. Overall, this Baymont is a good basic hotel doing things right.

Reviews.Title: “My Trip to Dallas”
Reviews.Author: Joseph S
Reviews.Content: I travel to Dallas from Austin at least 3 times a month. I always stay at the Baymont Inn & Suites Love Field at 2370 W. Northwest Highway. My experience has always been excellent from the moment I check in, the accomodations and breakfast. Everyone is so friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and the bed is superior. I would never stay anywhere else. The location to the city and all the activities that I participate in are in proximity to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “3 Day Stay”
Reviews.Author: Alwaysontheroad39
Reviews.Content: I just spent 3 days in Dallas for training. I found this hotel to be a great place to stay. From the front desk clerk (Steve) at check in until I checked out with the General Manager (Sam) my stay was perfect. I found this hotel to be clean and quite contemporary in it's decor. I particullary found the beds to be really comfortable. Better than being at home.

Reviews.Title: “All around dissapointed.”
Reviews.Author: stellakay
Reviews.Content: We got a suite. It was across from the elevator. We asked for another room away from the elevator, and Steve said that they didn't have another suite, and since we booked through Hotels.com, he couldn't get us any different room. Understandable. Problem 1: The shower sets off the fire alarm. After an average-heat, average-length shower made ours go crazy. Problem is that it wouldn't go off. We called Steve downstairs, he came up (alarm still sounding), and took it to find a battery. A few minutes later, he returned, and the fire alarm was fine. Conclusion- You MUST shower with the door closed, or the steam sets off the alarm. Inconvenient at 11pm, for probably the whole floor of the hotel. That night: The hotel is near numerous gentleman's clubs. "The Men's Club" parking lot is diagonal from the rear of the hotel (also, a boarded up building), and was our suite view. Sometime after the shower incident, we heard what sounded like fireworks. Strangely similar to a single gunshot. Definately creepy, but not much we could do, except be thankful we were on the second floor. Next morning: Cockroach in toilet. Probably had fallen out of the air vent right above the toilet. Made the room feel GROSS, but we couldn't get another room. Not sure how this became the #2 hotel on TripAdvisor. The price wasn't special... Could have stayed downtown at the Omni or the Hyatt Regency for the same price. Steve was very nice, and did what he could to meet our needs. We won't be back.

Reviews.Title: “excellent service and great staff”
Reviews.Author: Amy B
Reviews.Content: my name is margaret bradley. i stayed at the baymont in dallas on oct7,8,and 9th. the staff was wonderful and helpful. the hotel was neat and very clean. rooms were spacious and roomy and clean. i loved the staff. they made me feel like family. i will definitely stay at the hotel again.it was a pleasure .

Reviews.Title: “My third trip there and it was great as always.”
Reviews.Author: AmarachAcres
Reviews.Content: In the three times I've been to this hotel (Twice for business once for pleasure) they have not disappointed. The hotel has been renovated with every detail in mind and none of it is out of place. Their lobby and breakfast room are modern and comfortable, the pool room is clean and fresh and the rooms are just right. My favorite is the carpet, its thicker than most and comfortable to walk on and nice looking. The staff is very friendly and the manager makes time to talk to people to see how their stay was. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Best Wedding Reception”
Reviews.Author: Antwanelle F
Reviews.Content: When my husband and I started to plan our wedding we started out with limited time and money. The staff at the Baymont made me feel like family from my initial call until I checked out of the hotel. We made the decision to have the wedding reception at the Baymont with no knowledge of the accolades and recommendations that come with the Baymont Inn and Suites. The customer service from the staff is superb. My family booked at least 10 rooms and I have heard nothing but praise and planes for return visits from those who stayed. Whether you are staying for business or pleasure you will enjoy your stay and the staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay... :)”
Reviews.Author: TAGrant
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I live in Dallas, TX. But needed sometime away from our hectic lives and needed some alone time for the Labor Day weekend. Based off a previous reviews, we booked our stay here. And I am very glad we did. It was a very clean hotel/room. Sunita ( the lady who checked us in) was very friendly and helpful. I wish we brought our swimming gear because the pool seemed very inviting. Our stay was very quiet and relaxing. I wish we had a longer stay. :( FYI, don't expect a populated location. The hotel was a bit secluded. Which we liked...

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel to stay while in Dallas.”
Reviews.Author: emmasdaddy31
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love staying here while we are in Dallas. My wife makes frequent trips to Dallas and she loves this place. This place is so clean and nice. They have an awesome indoor pool that our daughter loves to spend time in. The staff is always so friendly. My wife actually looks forward to staying here. When we visit this place we feel so welcomed and Sam and his wife make us feel like they have known us forever. Steve is also always so friendly and helpful. If your coming to the Dallas area you have to stay at this place, you won't go wrong. It is also close to all the attractions in Dallas. I can't say enough about this place it is just awesome, you will just have to come and see for yourself, and once you do, you will always come back to this place. Kyle from Arkansas

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: OKcharlie
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel near Love Field and Stemmons. Easy access to everything. Rooms were very clean and management was very responsive when the hair dryer didn't work. Suite faced back of hotel and was very quiet, though don't expect any million dollar views. Breakfast was good and fresh. Free wifi with no fumbling around for a password. Business center with printer came in handy for printing boarding passes. Overall a great place to stay close to Love Field.

Reviews.Title: “Great place and even better staff!! Will Go Back!”
Reviews.Author: heidz64
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with our family and absolutely LOVED it! I am very very picky and spent hours researching and picking a hotel for our 5 night stay in Dallas. We were there for the Cowboys opening pre season game, a little drive from this hotel but not bad at all. The remodel is top notch and clean and very professional for hotel only rated at this star level. The breakfast is very nice! Some hot food choices and lots of yummy carb loading breakfast too! All of the staff went above and beyond with superior service, especially Steve! Thank you for a great trip! ***

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: judysuperfree
Reviews.Content: They property is well tended, the check-in was very smooth and comforting, the lobby was beautiful and tidy, and my room was cool, clean, and the haven I needed for this business trip. the personal attention from Sam and Sunita was above and beyond what I would have expected from a much larger facility at a much larger price. Their hospitality is deep and is echoed from their personnel, every one. All the other reviews are true. You cannot be unhappy about this selection. I spent a section of time walking through the complete hotel just to enjoy the feel of it. I really loved the breakfast area walls. The brown mosaic treatment is soothing and sparkling. It is not always easy to incorporate the work of 'kitchen' with the other duties of lobby and front desk but this whole large area really resonates with me. Thank you Sam, Sunita, and the Staff of Baymont Love Field!

Reviews.Title: “I am very picky and I love this place!”
Reviews.Author: Luluhalabaloo
Reviews.Content: In a nutshell, this is an all-around great place. Rooms are very modern; mine has double queens with triple sheeted quilts, really nice sheets along with 3 great pillows each. I have a coffee maker, iron and spotless ironing board, two laundry bags, good quality plastic sealed paper cups, flat screen Samsung Tv with HD (!) and tons of channels. Large work table with leather chair, lamps with outlets, really nice phone, very nice fridge and microwave, big bathroom with granite counter, lots of very clean smelling towels, and new modern furniture, art and a really nice carpet. AC works very well in this crazy heat, windows have both nice shears and light blocking drapes, and the beds are really, and I mean really good. Indoor pool and hot tub are modern and perfect temperatures, large clean and locking laundry, ice and vending machine rooms. Lobby and breakfast area (serving hot breakfast including eggs and sausage) is really well appointed and modern. Good location just down from a ton of great restaurants like Papasitos and 15 min from a great mall Northpark center, off racks and outlets. Staff are amazing - they get to know you by name and cannot do enough for you. Steve welcomed us and was very attentive, and Sunita Bhikha cannot make us happier. I highly recommend this hotel but please leave a room for my next visit!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay. Friendly and helpful staff. Very nice room.”
Reviews.Author: Robin G
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay here very much. All of the staff members were friendly and helpful. Ms. Sunita Bhikha was very friendly to me upon checkout and wanted to ensure that we had a pleasant stay. The room was very nice and a great rate. Definitely a good deal. Thank you so much for everything and we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service and accomodations”
Reviews.Author: Mathdoc007
Reviews.Content: We were abandoned by American Airlines late at night. Checking with the hotels near Dallas-Fort Worth airport, we were greeted by very high prices and uncaring staff. Then I called the Baymont and was greeted by a friendly, caring staff member who offered us a "distressed rate". The owner and staff were unbelievably accomodating and friendly. They gave us an amazing two room suite at low cost, opened breakfast a couple hours early the next morning for the benfit of travelers like us who had to catch a red-eye flight to get home. They are definitely the hotel of choice for my family in the future.

Reviews.Title: “The most comfortable bed I've ever slept in.”
Reviews.Author: nanapip
Reviews.Content: The service I received was excellant. Staff was wonderful, esp. Steve. He was most helpful to me. The room was spacious, clean and quite comfortable. The pool and spa was so relaxing.Good breakfast. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Service & Definitely will return to stay”
Reviews.Author: Jerry M
Reviews.Content: Everthing from the kind hospitality right up to the guidance provided by the hotel management and staff was excellent...

Reviews.Title: “This one gets our 5-C rating!”
Reviews.Author: toothin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stay at lots of hotels when traveling, but this is the first time we have stayed at a Baymont Inn & Suites. We give this particular one our 5-C rating: 1. Clean - Always at the top of our list. They didn't disappoint with very clean rooms and good housekeeping, minus the musty odors you experience in some hotels. 2. Courteous - Outstanding, accommodating staff made us feel our business was really appreciated. 3. Comfortable - Uncomfortable beds is a frequent complaint when we stay at hotels. Well, not this time! We have owned Select Comfort Sleep Number beds for years and have found them to be very comfortable. So, we were pleasantly surprised, that though not a Sleep Number, the bed in our room rivaled our Sleep Number for a good restful sleep! In addition, the bed linens were clean and smelled fresh! 4. Convenient - Centrally located off W Northwest Hwy, one can readily access the city's major thoroughfares for ease of travel. 5. Cost Conscious - This place is a bargain with it's affordable rates. This was our first experience with a Baymont Inn & Suites, but it will not be our last. For certain, when we are in Dallas, we will lookup this place!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise. Great hotel for the money.”
Reviews.Author: BushiePants
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel on Trip Advisor. It was a great value. The hotel staff was especially friendly and recommended the adorably Texan Papas BBQ down the street. Great stay!

Reviews.Title: “comfortable...very comfortable!!!”
Reviews.Author: ropa7
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay there. I was first taken aback by the professionalism of the front desk manager, Mark. He was very informative and made me feel right at home. the rooms are one of the best i have seen in dallas. The rooms are well equipped and clean. Keep it up guys!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: rjrafay
Reviews.Content: The hospitality was great, beds were very comfortable, and the price was great! I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone needing a place to stay in this area. While it it kind of tucked away, getting in and out and onto the various highways was very simple.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel bed ever!”
Reviews.Author: Darksideemt
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here on our wedding night recently so we could catch our plane out of Lovefield the next morning. We got in around 11pm and were pleasantly greeted by the lady at the front desk (sorry I don't remember her name). Even though the hotel is not in the greatest of areas, the room was great. It was very clean and had perhaps the most comfortable bed we have ever slept in. In the morning when we got up to have breakfast before we left, the same girl was still at the desk and was just a pleasant. She was also the one that had set up the breakfast for the guest and she really does a great job. Probably deserves a big raise. We were waiting for our shuttle time and what we thought was the manager, turns out it was the owner, asks if we were ready for our ride. I said yes and asked if he drove the shuttle as well and he said he did. When we walked out, our shuttle was the owner's own car, which was a very nice German car (no names). I asked if this was the shuttle and he said they have a van but since it was just my wife and I he prefered to take his car. This is personal service at it's finest. Never imagined such a nice shuttle ride to the airport. If you need a place to stay near Lovefield I would recommend Baymont Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great little place, comfortable and good value with personal service”
Reviews.Author: Elliie_111
Reviews.Content: Really great little stopover hotel, a cut above other off-highway places we've visited! Our room was comfortable, smart and clean, and we also liked the very new pool and fitness center. The service was really great - it's the kind of place that the staff remember your name and know the local area in depth, and the owner is on hand for a chat. The location was convenient for the airports and driving to town, so we liked it, but do be aware that you will need a car to get in and out, unlike a city-center base. As someone else pointed out, there are a few (pg-rated) signs for gentlemen's clubs along the highway, but as it is a drive-only area, this had no impact at all on our stay, and I would absolutely be happy to have my family here. Overall, we greatly enjoyed our stay, and would certainly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “This is the place, they call you by your first name”
Reviews.Author: MrMusicManKansasCity
Reviews.Content: I want to run folks to this hotel. The management staff give you one on one attention. Its nice when you stay at hotel that make you feel you are welcome in their home. The hotel is excellent more than your dollar value. And the staff will make any discomfort (if any ) right. The full breakfast won my group over.......every morning there was a hearty breakfast. Sausage, eggs, fresh biscuts, juice, wow!!! I realize I'm missing the hotel and its been one day. The 24/7 business center, 6am -11pm pool and whirlpool was available for those who had a fixed business schedule. Short drive downtown. Looking for a place to eat?...........you have every opportunity to find food on the same street. In fact its a perfect location with lots of attractions minutes from the hotel. Thanks Sam, your wife and staff for a welcoming experience

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST”
Reviews.Author: briantoney432
Reviews.Content: I really could not ask for more out of a hotel. One our three nights there the staff was so helpful, every single member of the staff that I had any interaction with was extra friendly and helpful, rooms, lobby, and pool were clean and in good repair. didn't use the fitness room but during a quick walk through it looked to be excellent with a flat screen tv on the wall and a treadmill, weight station, exercise bike, and complementary water. the business center looked good with two computers with wide screen, which i never had to use because the wireless access had great signal in my room. I have's ever stayed at a better place.

Reviews.Title: “Great overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: Wahlumgirl
Reviews.Content: I spent the night at the Baymont for a one day business trip, and my room was spotless, my bed comfortable, the front desk clerks (both pm and am) genuine and helpful, and the breakfast excellent. Would definately return.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but location is not good”
Reviews.Author: Mike_SLC
Reviews.Content: It was a nice hotel for the price and we had a comfortable stay. However, driving in on Northwest Highway we passed through an area that had multiple gentlemens clubs, in fact there is one almost right next door. Not a very inviting experience with a young family.

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT! Great place with a friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: Pierponter
Reviews.Content: Just recently, this motel was completely - and beautifully - remodeled inside & out. Every employee that we dealt with was smiling & helpful. The room, pool area, & hot breakfast were just great.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, close to Love Field”
Reviews.Author: mhow92
Reviews.Content: Newer facility, or recently upgraded. Room was very clean and good size. Excellent breakfast area and selection. Located just down street from numerous restaurants. Easy access to and from I-35 E.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay from start to finish.”
Reviews.Author: blueiies
Reviews.Content: My sister and I stayed at the Baymont Inn on our trip to Dallas. Kudos to Sean who was there to check us in...he was the best. He printed out maps for us to easily get to the destinations that we wanted to visit while in Dallas. The rooms were nice and clean and I am a very picky hoteler. I don't like to stay in older run down hotels. I can't say enough about how nice this place was...there was even an indoor pool and hot tub. Breakfast was nice with waffles, eggs, meat and muffins. I would certainly stay here again if I ever went back to the Dallas area.

Reviews.Title: “Totally Awesome Hotel.......Will never stay anwhere else in Dallas again!”
Reviews.Author: Mimito6
Reviews.Content: Sis and I came to Dallas for a quick weekend shopping trip to Dallas....We choose the Baymont Inn & Suites Dallas/Love Field for it's location....it was on the North side of Dallas and fairly close to several places we intended to shop.....From the moment we walked in the lobby, we were treated like valued guests.....Our room was so nice.....it was clean, it was comfy....and those beds....boy did they ever feel good after a long day of shopping....The front desk staff went out of their way to be friendly and helpful, even printing off maps for us and making some very excellent restaurant recommendations ( Pappacito's for great Mexican, and Texas Land & Cattle for steak).....I can honestly say these folks treat you like family and I'll only stay here when I return to Dallas for future shopping trips!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!!”
Reviews.Author: swosunscr12
Reviews.Content: Very clean, beautiful decor, comfortable beds, delicious breakfast! The front desk guys while we were there were fantastic! Super friendly, smiling, and so welcoming. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff made a wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: Eddie14theroad
Reviews.Content: Our room had a few problems when we arrived. Steve, at the front desk, swung into action and brought in the staff to repair and make our stay perfect. The suite was furnished beautifully. The beds were extremely comfortable. We were there for four days and were impressed with the friendliness of all the staff from the front desk, the cafe, housekeeping, and maintenance staff. The suite had a bathroom in both rooms which was great for four people.

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: mackessien
Reviews.Content: i felt welcome at the hotel and the services was out-standing tht words can't explain. the cleanliness of the hotel was a plus i thought i was in a five star hotel . the hotel is brand-new and the beding is very comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service.”
Reviews.Author: creativethreads2
Reviews.Content: Made me feel like this was home away from home. The owner of the property was always around making the experience very personal. Seemed like issues, if any, were resolved instantly because of his presence.

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel”
Reviews.Author: JenCaldwell
Reviews.Content: My family stayed here for my birthday weekend! We are from Oklahoma and came to Dallas to go to Medieval Times. I found the hotel online and booked it because they had an indoor pool, with kids this is very important! Having never stayed at a Baymont Inn and Suites before, I wasn't sure what to expect. Therefore I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of our stay. The staff was very friendly, breakfast was satisfying, the pool and hot tub were a great bonus, and the rooms were clean! We have 3 kids including an infant and we all had a blast in the indoor pool! Couldn't brag enough on the staff who made us feel like we were right at home! Great place to stay, can't wait to go back! :)

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise!”
Reviews.Author: daltravlr
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a new hotel, but turns out it was an awesome renovation. Very friendly, professional staff. Clean, comfortable, contemporarily decorated spacious rooms with free hi speed internet. Nicely tucked away location just a few blocks off interstate near a host of restaurants and entertainment options, and minutes from Dallas Love Field. Excellent value for the buck. Check this hotel out!

Reviews.Title: “Great quality and service”
Reviews.Author: sampila17
Reviews.Content: After the re-model the quality and service improved significantly. We were pleasantly surprised with the upgrades and changes the new management has implemented. The front desk staff was excellent, helpful and very friendly. We stayed a couple of times a few years ago (before the remodel) and it was in a so-so condition. After the remodel it has become a entirely different hotel. Now it is a hotel we would recommend out of the 3 other hotels nearby. The rooms have been completely remodeled with new furniture (mattresses) and carpeting. The furniture and wall colors have been updated to warm inviting colors. They offer a complete continental breakfast which is included is the price. (The breakfast area has also been remodel as well. It is modern and inviting.) Gaby

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Remodel, Great Rate! I'll stay here every business trip.”
Reviews.Author: biztraveler918
Reviews.Content: The beds were amazing! The entire hotel from the lobby to the rooms was chic, comfortable boutique hotel all the way. Evidently new owners have taken over this hotel and WOW they really know what they're doing! (I had stayed here before under the old owners & it had really gone to the dogs). This is on par with Marriott and downtown boutique hotels for 1/2 the price. You won't find a better business travel in deal in Dallas. It's also in a great location (restaurant row, AMC movies & Starbucks are right across the street. Northpark Mall & downtown are only 10 minutes in either direction. Airports are both close as well. I will continue to stay here every trip I make to DFW - super value!

Reviews.Title: “Recently Remodeled & Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Justin4119
Reviews.Content: I stayed here just recently and had a great experience. The staff was fantastic and the hotel was recently remodeled.

Reviews.Title: “SO glad that we stopped here!”
Reviews.Author: kittyconni
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at this hotel earlier in the month. We didn't have a reservation and we are very glad that we stopped in at the Baymont! The room was very clean and the beds were very comfortable! The view from the hotel window was very nice and the entire hotel smelled very nice. The indoor pool/spa area was clean and inviting and the hotel staff were second to none. The front desk clerk even made the waffles for the kids the next morning so that my mother and I could sit and enjoy our breakfast. I am very glad that we stopped in at this hotel. They have security on premisis and I was not afraid to go down to my car and get items that we had forgotten after it got dark. Thank you for a wonderful family experience!

HotelInfo.Name: Baymont Inn & Suites Dallas Love Field
HotelInfo.Address: 2370 W Northwest Highway, Dallas, TX 75220
